about_the_game:
Bad Janitor is a game, where your objective as an undercover janitor is to get tenants to move out of their apartments by discreetly annoying them, so the buildings can be torn down and get rebuilt into office complexes by your actual employer, CityGrind Corp. You will also have to perform basic janitorial duties to keep your job and cover.

STORY

Your big day is here! After ten years of slowly climbing through the ranks at CityGrind Corp, you’ve finally been scheduled to meet the boss. Rumours around the office tell of a new and innovative land acquisition method that can quickly turn financially unimportant apartment buildings into beautiful new office complexes. Your meeting with the boss confirms these rumours and you get transferred to a new position to implement them in practice.

You’re slipped in to a company that provides janitorial services to apartment buildings around the city and begin your campaign of annoyance.

FEATURES

  • Sneak into apartments while no one’s home and interact with objects in silly ways to annoy tenants.

  • Career mode offers 20 buildings to empty out with escalating difficulty and increasing floor count.

  • Unlock Freelance Job mode after finishing Career mode to create custom buildings and choose your janitor’s attributes.

  • Choose your janitor from three characters with varying attributes.

  • Tenants come in 15 variations, with individual daily schedules and ways to annoy them.

  • Use a selection of janitorial aids to help annoy tenants.

  • In-game music player with 11 unique songs to choose from to get you in the mood for mischief.

name: Bad Janitor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Play undercover as a janitor with the objective of getting tenants to move out by discreetly annoying them, so the buildings can be torn down and get rebuilt into office complexes by your actual employer, CityGrind Corp. You must also perform basic janitorial duties to keep your job and cover.
